description:
Look up information on any Halo Reach player using Halo Stats.

Update 0.7.7 fixed the K/D Ratios, and attempted to correct issues in webOS 2.1.0.

Thanks everyone for all the great comments and suggestions in the reviews!  I read every single one and appreciate all the feedback - positive or otherwise!  And thanks for your continued patience as I get these updates written!

Information provided by this application:
- Emblem
- Service Tag
- Armor Completion %
- Last Game Type Played
- Last Online Date / Time
- Picture of your Spartan*
- Rank
- Daily Challenges Completed
- Weekly Challenges Completed
- Current Daily & Weekly Challenges
- Commendation Information
- Rank Images
+ Corrected(!) K/D Ratios and Totals

*Bungie is not showing customizations on their images at this time. However, it is expected that they will implement this soon, and Halo Stats will not require an update to see the change.
